title: Extra E-Cards, T-Cards, Cracker Jack and More
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: Extra E-Cards, T-Cards, Cracker Jack and More
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I added a few very nice cards onto my web-site. You will like these.
I have to say that the scans didn't come out as good as I had hoped. The colors are much nicer in your hand than on the screen.

You can look at the cards from this link.

[url]http://www.cyscards.com/[/url]

To buy the cards, you can contact me at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

I have a list of the new cards below.

Thanks.

Cy

I've cleared out the cards that have been sold from my web-site.

[url]www.cyscards.com[/url]

Take a look at what's left. You may find something that you like.

Thanks.

Cy
card arrived today.  Thanks for the smooth, easy sale!
